entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
